EmailTemplate.name: mm-dd-20 HOS SMB Nurture Email Drip.mm-dd-21 HOS Nurture Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: How to grow sales with an app
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
How can an app give you a competitive edge? Havana Savannah, a coffee company and startup based out of California, wanted to differentiate themselves. To compete in the fast growing coffee market, they wanted to set themselves apart and to re-define their guest experience.
Read how <[[https://www.ncr.com/green-room/havana-savannah]]> this coffee startup increased their sales, grew their customer base and outpaced their goals with an app that does it all. Speak with an expert <https://www.ncr.com/restaurants/contact-us> on how you can launch an app of your own.
Sincerely, Jessica Bryant Vice President of Marketing ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
